changeSet.sql: insert into user (email, password) values ('r@b.com', 'secret1') insert into user (email, password) values ('b@b.com', 'secret2') insert into roletype (name) values ('type_1') insert into roletype (name) values ('type_2') insert into role (user_id, name, roletype_id) select id, 'role 1', 100 from user
